title: $1,150 / 1br - $1150 1BR Studio Monthly Move In Special (Lewisville)
posting_body: Suburban Extended Stay – Lewisville welcomes you in!
Come stay in one of our many room types available for both short and long term stays – offering full size refrigerators, 2 burner cooktop stoves, and microwave, along with so much more!
• Office is open 7 days a week ** 9am – 10pm
• All Utilities Paid – that means no additional costs!
• Pet friendly * with restrictions: Absolutely no cats.
• Conveniently located to shopping, restaurants, lakes and major highways
Whether you are a family relocating to a new city, a business traveler, vacationer, or just making a new start here in Lewisville, stop by or give us a call – we’d love to have you stay with us.
